text: Mbega nibo bagabura imigisha y’Umuremyi wawe, twebwe twarabugabuye ubu buzima bwabo ku buzima bwo ng’aha kw’Isi, kandi twarabareruye bamwe muribo tubaha n’iteka rininiya cane gusumba abandi, kuri ivyo rero bamwe muribo bagira abandi kuba ari abakozi babo, n’imigisha y’Umuremyi wawe niyo myiza gusumba ivyo begeranya
